Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Armitage
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Armitage due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Armitage due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#8 Halsted

#152 Addison

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Ashland.
ShortDescription: #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ashland, Archer, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Cermak/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ashland, Archer, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Cermak/Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are rr via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn & 55th, due to police activity nr 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn, then resume their normal route on 55th, due to police activity near 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.
